Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I recently got on a mod development (https://github.com/Askirkela/KSPCustomWarp) and I wanted some advises.

My mod is really simple since I just discovered the Unity game engine, but there are some things I can't figure out.

The aim of my mod is to change time warp ratios (I know there's many mods that can do that, but I wanted one that JUST do that).

So here are my problems :

First, I get to change the maximum ratio from x100 000 to x10 000 000.

Works fine but when I go from more than x1 000 000 to less than x100 000, my ships sometimes just explode...

I have seen in Planet Factory they don't have this problem, but I was not able to figure out how they do (Is there a tweak with the game engine?)

Second, I provided a small window with buttons to change ratios. Can you tell me how to get the current button look like it is pressed?

Anyway, thank you all!
PF turns off collision detection while in and coming out of high warp.

Ohoh! So that's the tweak...

Thanks NathanKell!
